tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_investment_history (
    user_id INT,
    investment_type VARCHAR(255),
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, investment_date)
)

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    investment_name VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    investment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    investment_name VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    investment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    investment_name VARCHAR(50),
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE financial_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    investment_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    investment_type TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    transaction_type TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance TEXT,
    investment_types TEXT[],
    last_recommendation_date TIMESTAMP
)
